name: .WLMX File Extension
summary: Learn about .WLMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a WLMX file with Microsoft Windows Live Movie Maker (Windows). However, Microsoft discontinued the program.

Since WLMX files are saved in the XML standard, you can open them with an XML or text editor. Options include SyncRO Soft oXygen XML Editor (multiplatform), Microsoft Notepad (Windows), and Apple TextEdit (Mac).

While opening a WLMX file with an XML or text editor allows you to view and edit the properties of an effect, it does not allow you to view the effect natively as if you opened it with Windows Live Movie Maker. Also, if you incorrectly edit the WLMX file, you may inadvertently corrupt the effect.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
